response.overview: AN UNKNOWN FACE appears on the stage of the alt right NPI conference. His username is MILLENNIAL WOES. The conference ends in a storm of publicity and outrage, as reports of Nazi salutes inside the conference are broadcast to the world in the wake of Trump's election. One man represented the British alt right: his name and address were soon leaked to the mainstream media, and Colin Robertson was "unmasked" in early 2017.  This film traces the YouTube career of Colin Robertson, catapulted into a world of politics that he never imagined himself cut out for. He is inundated with attention, both good and bad. As his channel grows, so do the stakes. This film deals with the birth, life, and death of one of the most notorious online movements in internet history, the alt right.
response.title: Whovian Woes
